title: Full Stack Developer
text: We are passionate about continuing the development of our staff and always welcoming more talent.

descr.point: Remote, Bengaluru , 4 to 5 Years Of Experience

details.point: Engage in opportunities to develop original content and concepts for web and mobile
Design & Create highly engaging industry-related content in both photo, gif & video format

requirements.point: At least 5 years of experience in developing and maintaining the front end of web applications.
Knowledge of React tools including React.js, Webpack, and Redux.

responsibilities.point: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in front-end development and provide recommendations for improvement.
Stay plugged into emerging technologies and industry trends.
Write high-quality, scalable, and reusable code.
